Description: Count of days passed since Covid-19 outbreak began
Number of household contacts for the previous day (averaged by country)
Total number of contacts for the previous day (averaged by country)
Number of times the respondent left the house on the previous day (averaged by country)
Number of times the respondent washed their hands on the previous day (averaged by country)
Score (0-100) related to how often the respondent wears a mask outside (100 = all the time)
majority of respondents say their live is greatly impacted by COVID (majority says so = 1, majority doesn’t say so = 0)
